text: Story highlights Heller tweeted her story Martinez issued a denial ( CNN ) A former contestant from ` ` The Voice'' is denying a rape accusation made by another female singer. Melanie Martinez, who appeared on the third season of ` ` The Voice'' in 2012, posted a statement on Twitter Tuesday in which she denied an allegation from a female friend who accused her of sexual assault. Martinez said in the statement that she was ` ` horrified and saddened by the statements and story told tonight by Timothy Heller [ her female friend ].'' ` ` What she and I shared was a close friendship for a period of time,'' the statement read. ` ` We came into each other's lives as we were both starting our careers as artists, and we tried to help each other.''
